definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
lit. to occupy a latrine but not shit (proverb)/fig. to be a dog in the manger
pinyin: zhan4 zhe5 mao2 keng1 bu4 la1 shi3

definition: lit. (a place where) birds don't defecate and hens don't lay eggs (idiom)/fig. god-forsaken/remote and desolate
pinyin: niao3 bu4 la1 shi3 , ji1 bu4 sheng1 dan4

definition: lit. (a place where) birds don't lay eggs and dogs don't defecate (idiom)/fig. god-forsaken/remote and desolate
pinyin: niao3 bu4 sheng1 dan4 , gou3 bu4 la1 shi3

sentences.english: I will shit in your mouth.
But this time YOU hold the pigeon down and I'll crap on its head!
sentences.chinese: 不过这回你来摁住鸽子，我在它头上拉屎。

sentences.english: The dog had made in the flower beds.
sentences.chinese: 这只狗在用花装饰的床单上拉屎。

sentences.english: Why to smoke to think shit?
sentences.chinese: 为什么抽烟完就想拉屎？

sentences.english: But soon the ox came back from his work to the manger.
sentences.chinese: 但是很快的牛回来，从他的作品占着茅坑不拉屎。

sentences.english: He is a real dog in the manger.
sentences.chinese: 他真的是占著毛坑不拉屎啦。

sentences.english: John is a dog in the manger.
sentences.chinese: 约翰是个占着茅坑不拉屎的人。

sentences.english: Instead, it makes noise, it pees, poos and barfs.
sentences.chinese: 它会制造噪音，撒尿拉屎，甚至生病呕吐。

sentences.english: Somebody comes and shits on my house?
Derrida Deconstruct the privileging of shit over crap.
sentences.chinese: 将大便对拉屎的特权解构。

sentences.english: No child wants to play with a dog in the manger.
sentences.chinese: 有哪个孩子想和占着茅坑不拉屎的人一起玩。

sentences.english: The cat pooped in my shoes?
I guess they didn't have toilets. Just stuck their asses out and shat in the moat.
sentences.chinese: 我想皇室没有厕所，他们只是脱了裤子往坑里拉屎。

sentences.english: You are really a dog in the manger.
sentences.chinese: 你真是个站着茅坑不拉屎的人啊。

sentences.english: I wonder, the word 'Please' could make you shit on my body.
sentences.chinese: 我不过是说了个请字，犯不着拉屎在我头上吧？

sentences.english: Without good education , she piddled everywhere in the room.
sentences.chinese: 也没有教育好，到处拉屎撒尿。

definition: to pass water/to piss/to urinate/to wee wee
to pee pee (kiddie or feminine slang)
Turkish toilet/squat toilet/to vacate one's bowels
to relieve oneself (i.e. use the toilet)/to solve
